name: politico
text:
President Trump today vowed to "put pressure" on governors to reopen schools in the fall. 

"It's time to be open, it's time to stay open," said Trump. "And we will put out the fires as they come up, but we have to open our schools" https://t.co/G3HavxiJox https://t.co/L2dPpIMuVl

text:

text:
Drugmakers raised the price of hundreds of medicines during the coronavirus pandemic.

Pharmaceutical companies logged more than 800 price increases this year, according to GoodRx

name: politico
text:
Donald Trump in a ramped-up push to reopen schools vowed Tuesday to “put pressure” on reluctant governors, while Betsy DeVos blasted education leaders who won’t accept risk and “gave up and didn’t try” to launch summer instruction

https://t.co/vKvaYgLypi

text: The arrival of a new political appointee is spawning confusion and concern at the U.S. Agency for International Development, where earlier staff changes have already led to serious internal tensions https://t.co/vd27YqXCyO

name: politico
text: With the Covid-19 pandemic showing no signs of abating, can Trump pivot to a new world in which crowds are definitely unsafe, and in some places even illegal? https://t.co/JbF36e44Ey
